p: Key exclusion criteria were use of hypomethylating agents, lenalidomide, thalidomide, pomalidomide, chemotherapy, or any other investigational agent after alloSCT; grade ≥II acute GVHD or evidence of gastrointestinal GVHD at screening; or malignancies other than MDS or AML, unless diseasefree for ≥1 year.
